definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="pickaxe" type="MCItem">pickaxe</variable><variable id="EnchtSize" type="Number">EnchtSize</variable><variable id="i" type="Number">i</variable><variable id="j" type="Number">j</variable><variable id="k" type="Number">k</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="-132" y="-94"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block collapsed="true" type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="itemstack_has_enchantment"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:Thewrathofhell</field><value name="item"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_fire"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="seconds"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">30</field></block></value><next><block type="deal_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type"><field name="damagetype">GENERIC</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
